outputs.output_descr: The project is designed to improved national capacities for Millennium Development Goals (MDG) related research, data collection and compilation, disaggregation, analysis and reporting systems. It is hoped that with access to sound information, the country will be able to mainstream the MDG's into national plans and budgets whilst simultaneously straightening national planning capacities.

project_descr: Belize: Millennium Development Goals Needs Assessment and Cost Prognosis- Phase II
project_title: Belize: Needs Assessment and Cost Prognosis
